Race.SpecificTitle: Council Member -- District  4, Town of Arcadia
Wds.4&5 Fire Prot. Dist. -- 3.39 Mill - BOC - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
WARDS FOUR AND FIVE FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 3.39 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTION, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING  AND OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT IN AND FOR WARDS FOUR AND FIVE FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT, INCLUDING PAYING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES.
Race.FullText: Shall Wards Four and Five Fire Protection District of the Parish of Bienville, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a three and thirty-nine hundredths (3.39) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No. 6 -- 7.19 Mill - BOC - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 6 PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 7.19 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING, OPERATING AND/OR PURCHASING FIRE PROTECTION EQUIPMENT AND FACILITIES FOR FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 6, INCLUDING PAYMENT OF SALARIES IN CONNECTION THEREWITH.
Race.FullText: Shall Bienville Parish Fire Protection District No. 6, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a seven and nineteen hundredths (7.19) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and/or purchasing fire protection equipment and facilities for the District, including payment of salaries in connection therewith?

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation Dist. No. 1 -- 3.28 Mill - BOC - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
RECREATION DISTRICT NO. 1 PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 3.28 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING LANDS, BUILDINGS, EQUIPMENT AND OTHER FACILITIES AND FOR THE CONSTRUCTION AND MAINTENANCE THEREOF, AND TO PROMOTE RECREATION AND ANY RELATED ACTIVITIES WITHIN RECREATION DISTRICT NO. 1.
Race.FullText: Shall Bienville Parish Recreation District No. 1, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of three and twenty-eight hundredths (3.28) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of acquiring lands, buildings, equipment and other facilities, and for the construction and maintenance thereof, and to promote recreation and any related activity within the District?
